entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly sunny. High minus 9.

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this evening. Amount 2 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 9. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 21 February 2023
